name: @tpmjs/tools-exe-dev
description: Manage exe.dev virtual machines. Create, list, delete, restart VMs, manage sharing, and execute commands via SSH.

env.name: EXE_DEV_SSH_KEY
env.description: Base64-encoded SSH private key for exe.dev authentication. Generate with: cat ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 | base64

tools.name: list
tools.description: List all exe.dev virtual machines for the authenticated user.

tools.name: create
tools.description: Create a new exe.dev virtual machine with optional image, env vars, and Shelley prompt.

tools.name: deleteVm
tools.description: Delete an exe.dev virtual machine permanently.

tools.name: exec
tools.description: Execute a command on an exe.dev VM via SSH.

tools.name: shareShow
tools.description: Show the sharing configuration for an exe.dev VM.

tools.name: shareSetPublic
tools.description: Make an exe.dev VM's HTTP proxy publicly accessible.

tools.name: shareSetPrivate
tools.description: Make an exe.dev VM's HTTP proxy private.

tools.name: sharePort
tools.description: Configure the HTTP proxy port for an exe.dev VM.

tools.name: shareAddUser
tools.description: Grant a user access to an exe.dev VM by email.

tools.name: shareRemoveUser
tools.description: Revoke a user's access to an exe.dev VM.

tools.name: shareAddLink
tools.description: Generate a shareable link for an exe.dev VM.

tools.name: shareRemoveLink
tools.description: Revoke a shareable link for an exe.dev VM.

tools.name: whoami
tools.description: Get the current exe.dev user's account information.

tools.name: shelleyInstall
tools.description: Install or upgrade Shelley agent on an exe.dev VM.
